name: StarForce Fighter
overview: Earth is losing this war. After years of fighting the Imperial Forces of Dalsarn are over-running more and more of the galaxy. With their larger Industrial base, they are turning out many more ships than Earth's factories can ever hope to produce. The beleaguered Terran Star Force is stretched to the limits defending Earth's territory against the myriad robot ships the Delsarnians can send against them. You Must fly in one of "The Few", Piloting your Star Force Fighter against immense odds. Only your skill and determination will save your life. The defense of the Earth rests on your shoulders.
